title: Man, I feel like I'm finally too old to use youngster lingo.
body:
Like I see these babies who keep saying "fam" because they're too lazy to say family and that's pretty much the last straw for me. Any new phrases I see, I'm going to assume is infantile and pointless.

The last phrase of my youth will probably be "thirsty" and that's already a bit annoying to me.


I'm calling you guys whippersnappers from now on. GFTO my lawn.
